scripts.analyze: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./dist/build-manifest.json', 'utf8')); console.log('Build Analysis:'); console.log('Total Size:', manifest.totalSizeFormatted); console.log('Files:'); Object.entries(manifest.files).forEach(([file, info]) => console.log(`  ${file}: ${info.sizeFormatted}`));"
scripts.serve: echo 'Use your preferred web server to serve the dist/ directory'
